data.name: Beast Crimes - Ancient Egypt
data.detailed_description:
New cases set in the time period ancient egypt! Are you able to solve more thrilling mysteries in Beast Crimes?


HELLISH HOUND: Villagers has recently been hearing strange sounds from the tombs. It seems someone is eating the flesh out of the deceased. Who could be behind this sacrilegious crime?


EARLINESS ENIGMA: Thoth is determine to become a god of wisdom. However one day during dawn his master suddenly dies without any logical reasons. Could Thoth use his knowledge to solve this mysterium?


SISTERHOOD SACRIFICES: There are several gods with sister's in Egypt, two of them is the ruler of upper and lower Egypt Wadjet and Nekhbet. One night a head of a gazelle is floating in a river in the middle of Egypt. Who's responsible and will this result in a war between the sisters?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
